attributes.action: Enforce work at home for office non business critical staff during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Many businesses are not implementing work from home on the basis the government have not set out clear direction. In many examples this is the only reason and not because it isn’t practical to do so. If the government issue guidance that all staff where possible are home based this will be implemented quickly, lowering the spread of the disease.
attributes.background: Escalate measures forcing companies to enable staff to work from home during the pandemic, that are not in business critical functions.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that people should only travel to work where this absolutely cannot be done from home.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
